action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢
▢ X X ▢ ▢
X X X X X
▢ X X ▢ ▢
▢ ▢ X ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A symmetrical 5x5 grid with a diamond pattern. The center row (third row) is fully filled with X's. The second and fourth rows have three X's each, centered. The first and fifth rows have a single X in the middle position.

Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:

X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: 5x5 grid. All rows start and end with X. Row 2 also has X in columns 2 and 4. Row 3 has X in column 3.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A symmetrical 5x5 grid with a diamond pattern. The center row (third row) is fully filled with X's. The second and fourth rows have three X's each, centered. The first and fifth rows have a single X in the middle position.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
